bibl.title: Letter from John R. Kissinger to Howard A. Kelly, March 8, 1907

div1.p: Kissinger requests an article on yellow fever experimentation from Kelly.

div1.head: Letter from John R. Kissinger to Howard A. Kelly, March 8, 1907
div1.opener:
Please return
to H A Kelly
606 E Keasey St
South Bend
Ind.
March 8, 1907
Mr Howard A Kelly
14-18 Eutaw Place
Baltimore Md.
Dear Sir:-
div1.p:
I sent one of my
Photograph to you this
eve, you will please return
it as soon as possible for
it is all I have of that
Kind I took it for granted
you wish to write up an
article on the experiment
of Yellow Fever I had saw
your write up in the
youth Companion, will
you please send me
the Paper or Magazine
you put the article in
